desc: Manage the payment details and payment history of the workspace where you are given with master authority.

way.changeDesc: In order to change the payment method you must repurchase the product and service voucher at the payment center after automatic payment is canceled. Upon repurchase payment will be made with the changed payment method from the next payment date. After canceling the automatic payment proceed to purchase the voucher at the payment center.
way.cancel: Notice on change of subscribed product and automatic payment cancellation.
way.cancelDesc: When automatic payment is canceled or the subscribed product is changed the previously applied coupon will not be applied and cannot be reused. When automatic payment is canceled all users of the workspace will not be able to use VIRNECT products from the next payment date and product and service data will be kept for up to two weeks. If you pay again within 2 weeks of the scheduled payment date you can use the VIRNECT product with your existing information.

autoPaymentCancelModal.desc: Please double-check the product plan and subscription you want to cancel.
autoPaymentCancelModal.caution:
* If you cancel now you will be able to use the product and services until the remaining period.
* After 7 days of expiration data related to products and services will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
autoPaymentCancelModal.submitDoneDesc: Automatic payment has been cancelled. If you want to maintain the automatic payment you can cancel the "cancellation of the automatic payment" from tomorrow to one day before the expiration date.
autoPaymentCancelModal.cancelRequestCancelDesc: If you cancel the automatic payment cancellation application automatic payment will be resumed.
